title: Syncing with iCloud calendars.
content: Please tell me how to sync my Thunderbird calendar to pass my appointments to my iPad/iPhone running ios18.1.1. It used to work for iOS 17. I am using the current Thunderbird edition.
creator: 1vabeachboy

title: What will Thunderbird do if folder will be deleted?
content: What will Thunderbird do if I delete a folder which sorting rule in Thunderbird should move message? I need an answer which actual for Thunderbird versions 40 and higher. Thanks.
creator: PavelkoT

title: PRINTING
content:
Since installing thunderbird, following failure of my Outlook email manager I have been unable to print an email attachment using the system dialog option and also unable to print in draft format to save on ink.

Any suggested fix?
creator: kell.19

title: email body missing from emails in folders
content:
I use google to host my email account. I use Imap with TB 128.5.0 esr. MacOS 15.1.1.

Recently, maybe after last OS update, older emails stored in folders (synced with google mail) have zero body text. The same emails are fine on my ipad and phone.

I have check that all folders are subscribed and forced a sync.

Help!

Thank you!
creator: bryan68

title: double payment
content: I am retired and I get a little money from the CPP & Old Age, and I authorize a donation for you $7.90. But you are taking two donations from my account, the other is $ 11.13 which I didn't authorize. Please keep the money you got already and please do not get over payment any more. thank you. Pablo.
creator: pabloorellana933
